## Vector2.TransformToRef() method

Transforms the given vector coordinates by the given transformation matrix and stores the result in the vector "result" coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static TransformToRef(vector: ReadOnlyVector2, transformation: Matrix, result: Vector2): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines the vector to transform |
|  transformation | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the matrix to apply |
|  result | <code>Vector2</code> | defines the target vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
